name: Verify.IM
tag_list: identity, identity-verification, identity-aggregation, online-identity-verification, online-reputation-management, orm, internet-reputation-management, irm, authentic, trust, secure
overview:
Verify.IM is an independent third-party verification service that protects your online identity and makes you money doing it! Verify.IM helps friends, fans & followers verify that you are really you!

Here is how they do it;

First, Identity Verification. They take care of the annoying stuff so you don’t have to. They review official documents and make phone calls to make sure that the person you are dealing with is authentic.

Second, Identity Aggregation. Through your personal Verify.IM URL and web page they provide a single spot where you can list all of your personal profiles and web sites that you own.

Third, Income Opportunity. They provide a way for you to earn an income simply by displaying your verify.im badge and links to your social profiles, blogs and web sites.

milestones.description: We've just released our BETA API! Anyone looking to integrate an extra level of trust into their new or exisitng applicaiton can now do so by requesting an API key and reviewing our API page located here: http://verify.im/api.php
milestones.source_description: Verify.IM Announced the release of a new Identity Verification API

milestones.description: We've created custom mobile personal profile pages for all verified users. These mobile profile pages were designed to work directly with a users personal barcode.

We've been working with business owners on support for online business identities. Immediately after our initial release on September 1st, 2010 a large number of business owners expressed a need to both add credibility and authenticity for their business

milestones.source_description: Verify.IM Announced Their New Instant Identity Verification Service

milestones.description: Brand new iPhone and Android readable Verify.IM barcode badge! All active members now have access to both badges and high resolution personal barcodes. These barcodes can be used on business cards and other printed materials to enable anyone with a modern
milestones.source_description: Verify.IM Announced A New Personal Barcode Product For Members

milestones.description: All member profile pages now provide an email contact form. This form allows members to keep thier email address private and still receive messages. Check it out at http://Verify.IM/ErikBowman then click on the Email option.
milestones.source_description: Verify.IM Announced A New Email Contact Form

milestones.description: We've added over 200 social networks and web service providers to our identity aggregration service. What does this mean? Now each service you add will have an icon for the service and link to your profile! Learn more at http://verify.im/identity_aggregat
milestones.source_description: Verify.IM Announced The Addition of Over 200 Social Networks

milestones.description: We have integrated account creation and authentication services from Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin, MySpace, Google and Yahoo! to make it faster and easier for member sign up and sign in. Try it out here: Sign Up.
milestones.source_description: Verify.IM Announced The Integration of 6 Third-Party Services for Authentication

milestones.description: We've had over 50,000 member badge views in the first 2 weeks after initial pre-registration. Reserve your user name and start building your network today! Sign Up.
milestones.source_description: Verify.IM Announced Over 50,000 Member Badge Views in Less than 2 Weeks

milestones.description: The long awaited pre-registration period has arrived. Reserve your user name and start building your network today! Sign Up.
milestones.source_description: Verify.IM Announced The Opening Pre-Registration Period

milestones.description: On September 1, 2010 Verify.IM, the next evolution in online identity verification and online identity aggregation, will be opening up a pre-registration option for individuals and businesses. This pre-registration will enable members to reserve their use
milestones.source_description: Verify.IM Announced The Upcoming Beta Release of Identity Verification & Aggregation Service
